snippet.title: Gordian Quest Mobile Trailer | Mobile Gaming Show
snippet.description:
The epic deckbuilding RPG inspired by old-school classics like Ultima and D&D is coming to mobile. 

Subscribe to GamesRadar on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/user/GamesRadar
Follow on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/gamesradarplus/ 
Read more at https://www.gamesradar.com/
